reviewText: My 4 year old saw this advertised so we bought it for his Easter basket. He LOVES this dvd and enjoys the puppet action far more than the animated version. This keeps him laughing!
I bought this for my son's birthday. He was thrilled. He loves it and watches it all the time. Thanks.

My son really enjoyed watching this DVD he is a Scooby fan and  was fascinated by the puppets. He watches it over and over.
He is special needs and this DVD really holds his attention.
watching Scooby -doo adventures map is for every Scooby -doo fans every where
I had never heard of this one so I ordered it to add to my collection. It kind of reminds me of the Muppets movie but me and my nephew love it.
We couldn't find it anywhere else and it was a good price.

My niece will be very happy when I give Scooby-Doo! Adventures The Mystery Map to her as a gift.

Fast shipping and item as described.

Thanks!
